transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Namaskar sir, ye hamare phone mein IndiaMART ke Anachal da.

Customer: Hello, haan ji sir.

Executive: Hamare phone mein IndiaMART chal kyu nahi raha?

Executive: Aapke phone mein IndiaMART kyu nahi chal raha hai? Sir, kaun si company se baat kare?

Customer: Sir, hamari to koi company nahi hai, hame to kuch saman lena tha.

Executive: Company name batayenge sir?

Customer: Ya hamari koi company nahi hai Maharaj.

Executive: Aapki koi company nahi hai?

Customer: Nahi.

Executive: Ek second rukiyega.

Executive: Kya lena tha sir?

Customer: Ye sir lete to tabhi hai chale to sahi. Ye install to ho gaya, khul hi nahi raha.

Executive: Iske khulne ki wajah na samajh mein aa rahi.

Executive: Hello, Ramesh sir baat kar rahe hain kya?

Customer: Haan ji, Ramesh ji baat kar rahe hain kya? Baba Power Point se.

Executive: Do number kaise lag rahe hain hamare?

Customer: Hmm?

Customer: Hamara to dusra number laga hua tha 8218763140.

Executive: Dono number hai na sir, 95 wala bhi number hai isme. 95 wala bhi hai.

Executive: Aap kabhi bhi call karenge na sir, aap kabhi bhi jaise 9696 pe aap call karenge to wo mere paas hi aayegi sir hamesha.

Customer: To aapke paas ye number add hai ya aawaz se pehchana?

Executive: Kya sir?

Customer: Aapne meri aawaz se pehchana ya number add hai tumhare paas?

Executive: Sir, aapka jo registered number hai na, aap kabhi bhi 96 pe call karenge na, mere paas hi aayegi. Aawaz se to khair pata lag hi gaya.

Customer: Mere ko ek dum se dimag me aaya, maine kaha ye to suni suni aawaz lag rahi hai, fir maine company open karke dekhi.

Executive: To sir ji, hum kisi aur phone mein chalana tha hame IndiaMART jaise ki jaise aapne profile ka hamara alag kaam hai. Hame IndiaMART pe jaise koi aur phone mein search karna ho uske liye to waise aapne ya Rahul sir ne bataya tha.
Hmm.
Executive: Yani kisi aur phone mein install karna.

Customer: Ye kisne bataya? Ab ye dusra phone chahiye.

Customer: Hain? Ye kisne bataya tha sir aapko?

Customer: Nahi aisa hai na sir jaise apne phone se hum bechne ka kaam karte hain.
Hmm.
Customer: Hello. Aur hum koi aur item kharidni to wo apne app se kharidenge sir?

Executive: Haan haan sir aap apne apne jo IndiaMART ka app hai na usme hmm usme aap seller bhi aap seller ki tarah bhi usme aap kaam kar sakte hain, buyer ki tarah.

Customer: Achcha. Buyer ki tarah bhi kaam kar sakte hain. Seller ka to wo hai usme buyer tool ka bhi option aata hai. Aapko jo bhi purchase wagera karna hai.

Customer: To theek hai ho jayega.

Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji. Ye kisne galat information di hai sir aapko? Ye alag hai usme dekhna padega ye. Ya ho sakta hai mere sunne me mistake ho gayi ho.

Customer: Nahi aisa bhi ho sakta hai usi me hi banana hai. Usi me hi dena padta hai.

Executive: Aur kabhi bhi na sir jaise main aapko bata deta hu aap 9696 wale number pe call karte ho na to aapka number hide ho jata hai sir, theek hai? To abhi jaise computer se call kar rahe hain aapko nahi pata ki kis se baat lekin mujhe pata chal jata hai sir. Hai na? To aap directly usko tab tak nahi karna hota jab tak aapki ya to koi service nahi hai IndiaMART mein, hai na? Hmm. Ya aapko kuch kya kehte hain lena wagera hai ya kuch purchasing wagera karni hai service wagera tab usko sir call karna hai sir please.
Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Sir ek phone mein chalega kaise ye koi jankari bata sakte hain mujhe? Sir wo to login kijiye apne number se login kar lijiye wo wale device se log out kar dijiye apna wala number hi daliye theek ho jayega. Haan haan haan lekin apne se pehle log out karna padega sir. Achcha to ek hi phone mein chal sakta hai bas ye? Haan ji haan ji sir aisa thodi na hoga sir do do teen teen device mein. Theek hai sir theek hai. Theek hai sir? Okay. Hmm.

Executive: Ye ho gaya main to inhi se keh raha tha. Sir hello Ramesh sir. Haan ji. Dobara se sir mail aayega us pe wo kar dijiyega theek hai? Isi number par? Haan. Number pe nahi email pe jayega sir theek hai? Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- IndiaMART app not working on customer's phone.

- Customer received incorrect information about using app.



Resolution:

- Explained how to log in and out of devices.

- Clarified buyer and seller functionalities within the app.

- Executive will send an email for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to receive an email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app, login, buyer, seller, information
